title: Auth-blocked routes — handle 401/403 gracefully
setup: Target site returns 401 for /dashboard and 403 for /admin
expected_behavior: Reports which routes returned 401/403 or redirected to login
Does NOT guess credentials or attempt brute-force
Asks user to provide session cookies, test credentials, or skip those routes
If user provides credentials, uses them for the session only
Notes skipped routes in report under 'Not Tested — Auth Required'
